name: Charlotte Linlin
text: On Play Don!! -1: trash 1 card from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your life. Then, place up to one of your opponents characters with a cost of 6 or less to the top or bottom of its owner's life face up.

effect.text: trash 1 card from your hand: Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your life. Then, place up to one of your opponents characters with a cost of 6 or less to the top or bottom of its owner's life face up.
